Guidelines

Readability and Accessibility above all other design choices Keep it fast-loading and lightweight Keep it semantic html & css (I like to write my own code because wysiwyg editors make a big ol mess of everything behind the scenes.) Use HTTPS POSSE: Publish on your Own Site, Syndicate Elsewhere

Quick Reference

To add metadata for the fediverse, add this to the head of your html files:

To fetch webmentions, run: node .\fetch-webmentions.js

To run the site locally, use: npx eleventy --serve
